sentence.Network_en: Pandora was sent to the earth and was presented to Epimetheus.
sentence.Network_cn: 潘朵拉被派到人间送给伊比米修斯.

sentence.Network_en: Epimetheus had given all the powers to the other animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊比米修斯已经把所有这些能力给了其他的动物.

sentence.Network_en: He called the titans Prometheus and Epimetheus to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把两名泰坦人普罗米修斯和伊比米修斯找来.

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) brother of Prometheus; despite Prometheus's warning against gifts from Zeus he accepted Pandora as his wife
